zeroCase.title: Upload, connect, or create your first dataset
zeroCase.description: Bring your location data to CARTO so that you can visualise it and start predicting key insights. Learn about importing your data here.

emptyCase.onlyShared: No datasets here. Go to the datasets shared with you.

zeroCase.title: Create your first map to predict key insights
zeroCase.description: Build your first Location Intelligence app and start predicting key insights from your location data with our drag and drop tool for analysts and business users. Learn about Builder here.

emptyCase.onlyShared: No maps here. Go to the maps shared with you.

SolutionsPage.solutionsDescription: Consolidating your site network? Need to reduce fleet costs? Redesigning your sales territories? Answer your question through the lens of location.
SolutionsPage.talkUsDescription: Our account management team will give you a firsthand view and discuss with you how we can help your organization to do the same.

sitePlanning.title: Site Planning
sitePlanning.description: Drive site selection and investment decisions with always-on data streams, enabling more accurate revenue prediction and reduced risk of failed location decisions.

territoryManagement.title: Territory Management
territoryManagement.description: Design and align sales and service territories to increase productivity and reduce costs using spatial field operations data.

logisticsOptimization.title: Logistics Optimization
logisticsOptimization.description: Harness the power of geospatial to optimize your Supply Chain, enabling a smarter, more efficient operation.

cartovl.title: Develop an interactive custom web map
cartovl.subtitle: Develop impressive interactive maps and use them on your websites and apps.

step1.text1: The CARTO platform provides a set of libraries and APIs to develop you own customizable and interactive maps. CARTO VL is a Javascript library to build beautiful interactive web maps
step1.text2: In this quick guide you will learn how to load the libarry in your project, crete a map with one of our basemaps, and add a data layer.

step2.summary: Create an HTML file where you can load the map visualization library CARTO VL and the Mapbox GL libraries needed to run some of the vector features

howto.instruction1: Create an HTML file in your favourite IDE.
howto.instruction2: Add the following script code to the <head> element.

extras.resource1: Use your favourite Integrated Development Environments (IDE) but if you want a suggestion the favourite ones for the CARTO team are Visual Studio Code, Sublime, and Textmate.
extras.resource2: CARTO VL is our more advanced rendering library and it’s constantly adding new features. You can learn what cool stuff did we add lately in our Product Updates blog.

step3.summary: Define the <div> element that will contain the map

howto.instruction1: Include in the <body> of your HTML file a <div> element to contain the map. The map, layers, and controls will be displayed in this element
howto.instruction2: Paste the following CSS code in the bottom of the <head> element to define some basic styles for the map.

step4.summary: Create a MapboxGL map to render a basemap

howto.instruction1: Copy and paste this script below your <div> container to load the map:

step5.summary: Connect to a test CARTO account an add a data layer to your map

howto.instruction1: Connect to a CARTO account by specifiying the username and API key you want to use. In this case, we're using a test account and the default key
howto.instruction2: Now that CARTO VL has access to the account you can crate a basic layer to the map that displays the loaded data.

extras.resource1: If you want to learn more about how to add your own data to the map you can always visit the data injection section, at the Developer Center.

congrats.title: Congratulations!
congrats.message1: You finished your first map with CARTO VL
congrats.message2: Got questions? Download the full code example.

extras.resource1: Learn more with the following examples from our Developer Center.

card1.title: Style features by category
card1.subtitle: Learn how to change the style of the features by a given column

card2.title: Add hover popups
card2.subtitle: Learn how to display info about a feature when user mouses over it.

card3.title: Animate the features
card3.subtitle: Learn how to animate the features of the map by different columns.

cartoframes.title: Add spatial data to your data science workflow
cartoframes.subtitle: Integrate spatial data into your data science models using our Python library.

builder.title: Create a web map from your browser
builder.subtitle: Uncover insights from your location data with our online drag and drop tool.
